text: Joseph "Joe" Hamilton is an American goalball player. When Hamilton was a baby, he had a corneal transplant in his left eye after contracting rubella virus in the womb which restored his partial sight. He was left totally blind at the age of 12 after a snowboarding accident and two years later, he was introduced to goalball aged 14. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:People from Wayne, Michigan Category:Paralympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Goalball players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic goalball players of the United States Category:Male goalball players Category:Paralympic medalists in goalball
